      • checkState

        protected boolean checkState()
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Returns a flag indicating whether or not the renderable and release lists should be reconstructed based on the current GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.preparedState and GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.targetState. The default implementation compares the drawVersion of GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.targetState and GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.preparedState and ORs the result with GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.invalid.
        Overrides:
        checkState in class GLAsynchronousMapRenderable<com.atakmap.android.elev.graphics.HeatMapParams>
        Returns:
        true if the renderable and release lists should be reconstructed, false otherwise.

      • newViewStateInstance

        protected GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.ViewState newViewStateInstance()
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Creates a new ViewState instance. This method will be invoked to create the values for GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.targetState, GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.preparedState as well as a temporary ViewState that holds a copy of GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.targetState for the worker thread.

        This method may be invoked off of the GL context thread.

        Overrides:
        newViewStateInstance in class GLHeatMap
        Returns:
        A new ViewState instance.

      • updateRGBA

        protected void updateRGBA​(com.atakmap.android.elev.graphics.GLHeatMap.HeatMapState s,
                          com.atakmap.android.elev.graphics.HeatMapParams result)
        Overrides:
        updateRGBA in class GLHeatMap

      • query

        protected void query​(GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.ViewState s,
                     com.atakmap.android.elev.graphics.HeatMapParams result)
        Description copied from class: GLAsynchronousMapRenderable
        Performs a query based on the specified target state. The results of the query will be used to create valid render and release lists via GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.updateRenderableReleaseLists(Object).

        This method will only be invoked on the worker thread and its invocation will not be externally synchronized. Synchronization of the query itself on this is strongly discouraged as doing so will effectively block GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.draw(GLMapView).

        Overrides:
        query in class GLHeatMap
        Parameters:
        s - The state to query against
        result - Stores the result of the query. The pending data will subsquently be passed to GLAsynchronousMapRenderable.updateRenderableReleaseLists(Object).
